title: Waste of money!
review: I have not yet reewived the free games code when will i receive them it is bad i will not buy from flipkart again

title: Brilliant
review: Thanks to Flipkart for such a great deal. I exchanged one PS2 & purchased  this. I have one PS4 also. I can easily tell this is far superior  than PS4

title: Mind-blowing purchase
review: Excellent packing and mind blowing console... Pricing if flipkart is excellent.... great deal...

title: Useless product
review: I wish I never bought this item from you as  you are fooling people with the item saying the bundle contains 3 games and you are giving only one. Plz don't fall for this trap

title: Pathetic customer support
review:
Same story, received item with only one game code. Pathetic customer support, upon contacting saying initially that codes will be sent, then contact microsoft helpline and its super that they are saying that you have ordered only with one game code. Still awaiting response from them.

Reason for one star is only horrible customer support.

title: Perfect product!
review: Best Console In Cheap Price I bought it in 17490 by exchanging ps3 and 10% callback by sbi card....

title: Pretty good
review: So far so good... bought it for 14k... exchanged my old Xbox 360 for 6k... best in class... value for money...
